data.text:
Come on Sub-Trainer! 
Please, hurry up!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Come on Sub-Trainer! 
<story>Please, hurry up!

data.text:
The main stand of the Nakayama Racecourse is packed full of 
people and overflowing with excitement.
data.processed:
<story>The main stand of the Nakayama Racecourse is packed full of 
<story>people and overflowing with excitement.

data.text:
With the front row in our sights, Mejiro 
McQueen and I pushed through the crowd.
data.processed:
<story>With the front row in our sights, Mejiro 
<story>McQueen and I pushed through the crowd.

data.text:
With the front row in our sights, Mejiro 
McQueen and I pushed through the crowd.
data.processed:
<story>With the front row in our sights, Mejiro 
<story>McQueen and I pushed through the crowd.

data.text:
It's Oguri-san's final race, if I were to miss the moment she 
crosses the goal, I would regret it for the rest of my life.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>It's Oguri-san's final race, if I were to miss the moment she 
<story>crosses the goal, I would regret it for the rest of my life.

data.text: Then wouldn't it be fine if we watched it from the team seat-
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Then wouldn't it be fine if we watched it from the team seat-

data.text:
I told you before, didn't I? Oguri-san's running figure… 
I want to see her gallant figure with my own two eyes!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I told you before, didn't I? Oguri-san's running figure… 
<story>I want to see her gallant figure with my own two eyes!

data.text:
They're closing in on her, but she's still in the lead! 
Oguri is still in the lead!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>They're closing in on her, but she's still in the lead! 
<story>Oguri is still in the lead!

data.text:
Jeez, at this rate she'll pass the goal before 
we get there! Here, take my hand!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Jeez, at this rate she'll pass the goal before 
<story>we get there! Here, take my hand!

data.text: As she said that, she forcibly grabbed my hand.
data.processed: <story>As she said that, she forcibly grabbed my hand.

data.text: As she said that, she forcibly grabbed my hand.
data.processed: <story>As she said that, she forcibly grabbed my hand.

data.text:
She pulled me with such incredible force, 
and in an instant my view widened.
data.processed:
<story>She pulled me with such incredible force, 
<story>and in an instant my view widened.

data.text:
Oguri leads as they cross the finish line!! 
Oguri finished in first place!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Oguri leads as they cross the finish line!! 
<story>Oguri finished in first place!

data.text:
The Superstar Uma Musume, Oguri Cap! She finishes the Twinkle 
Series with a miraculous victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The Superstar Uma Musume, Oguri Cap! She finishes the Twinkle 
<story>Series with a miraculous victory!

data.text: Wow…!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Wow…!

data.text:
I will never forget what happened that day, because 
that was the day that I witnessed a miracle.
data.processed:
<story>I will never forget what happened that day, because 
<story>that was the day that I witnessed a miracle.

data.text:
I will never forget what happened that day, because 
that was the day that I witnessed a miracle.
data.processed:
<story>I will never forget what happened that day, because 
<story>that was the day that I witnessed a miracle.

data.text:
Amazing… that was amazing! 
She actually won!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Amazing… that was amazing! 
<story>She actually won!

data.text:
This is Oguri-san showing us 
how an "Ace" runs, isn't it…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>This is Oguri-san showing us 
<story>how an "Ace" runs, isn't it…?

data.text:
She accomplished this despite many people thinking that she was 
"done for" due to her losing streak, particularly when she came 
in 11th place in her last race.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She accomplished this despite many people thinking that she was 
<story>"done for" due to her losing streak, particularly when she came 
<story>in 11th place in her last race.

data.text:
Oguri and I are both incredibly prideful. When they write us off, 
it only serves to get us more fired up!
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Oguri and I are both incredibly prideful. When they write us off, 
<story>it only serves to get us more fired up!

data.text: Ah, good work, Trainer-san.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Ah, good work, Trainer-san.

data.text:
The voice we heard was that of the chief trainer of our team. He 
was the one who taught me what it meant to be a trainer.
data.processed:
<story>The voice we heard was that of the chief trainer of our team. He 
<story>was the one who taught me what it meant to be a trainer.

data.text:
The voice we heard was that of the chief trainer of our team. He 
was the one who taught me what it meant to be a trainer.
data.processed:
<story>The voice we heard was that of the chief trainer of our team. He 
<story>was the one who taught me what it meant to be a trainer.

data.text:
He's a veteran, having worked as a trainer for 30 years. He plans 
on retiring after the Arima Kinen, but…

choices.text:
It really is too early for you 
to retire, Sensei.
choices.processed:
<size=36>It really is too early for you 
to retire, Sensei.</size>

data.processed:
<story>He's a veteran, having worked as a trainer for 30 years. He plans 
<story>on retiring after the Arima Kinen, but…

data.text:
That may be true, but you and 
Oguri-san showed us such a magnificent race!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>That may be true, but you and 
<story>Oguri-san showed us such a magnificent race!

data.text: (Oguri! Oguri!!)
data.processed: <story>(Oguri! Oguri!!)

data.text:
The stadium is ablaze with "Oguri Calls!" It's 
causing the entire stadium to shake!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The stadium is ablaze with "Oguri Calls!" It's 
<story>causing the entire stadium to shake!

data.text:
One could tell that the 100,000 people that were there that day 
were in awe of Oguri Cap's running.
data.processed:
<story>One could tell that the 100,000 people that were there that day 
<story>were in awe of Oguri Cap's running.

data.text:
Which in turn meant that her trainer, who had worked so hard to 
raise Oguri Cap, had done his job perfectly.
data.processed:
<story>Which in turn meant that her trainer, who had worked so hard to 
<story>raise Oguri Cap, had done his job perfectly.

data.text:
This is proof that despite his age, 
he is still an amazing trainer…
data.processed:
<story>This is proof that despite his age, 
<story>he is still an amazing trainer…

data.text:
No, I'm at the end of my rope. I gave it my all 
to this end, and now I'm completely burnt out.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>No, I'm at the end of my rope. I gave it my all 
<story>to this end, and now I'm completely burnt out.

data.text:
So, as originally planned, 
I'm leaving Team Sirius in your hands.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>So, as originally planned, 
<story>I'm leaving Team Sirius in your hands.

data.text: He clasped my shoulder with immense force.
data.processed: <story>He clasped my shoulder with immense force.

data.text:
I spent two years studying hard as a sub-trainer with Sirius, a 
team created by the Chief Trainer.
data.processed:
<story>I spent two years studying hard as a sub-trainer with Sirius, a 
<story>team created by the Chief Trainer.

data.text:
I spent two years studying hard as a sub-trainer with Sirius, a 
team created by the Chief Trainer.
data.processed:
<story>I spent two years studying hard as a sub-trainer with Sirius, a 
<story>team created by the Chief Trainer.

data.text:
Whenever I wavered, whenever I was weak, 
he would encourage me in this manner.
data.processed:
<story>Whenever I wavered, whenever I was weak, 
<story>he would encourage me in this manner.

data.text: Make sure you're there to support McQueen.
data.processed: <story>Make sure you're there to support McQueen.

data.text:
After winning the Kikuka-shō, 
she's entered the peak of her development.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>After winning the Kikuka-shō, 
<story>she's entered the peak of her development.

data.text:
The combination of you and McQueen will definitely draw 
everyone's attention, even in G1 races.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>The combination of you and McQueen will definitely draw 
<story>everyone's attention, even in G1 races.

data.text:
That's right. Although, she can be unreliable at 
times, so it shall be me be supporting her instead.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>That's right. Although, she can be unreliable at 
<story>times, so it shall be me be supporting her instead.

data.text:
If I win the Spring Tennō Shō, I'm sure it will 
give her a little more confidence as well.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>If I win the Spring Tennō Shō, I'm sure it will 
<story>give her a little more confidence as well.

data.text: Please look forward to it.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Please look forward to it.

data.text:
Hahaha! She's already leading her by the nose! But 
it looks like they're enjoying themselves.
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Hahaha! She's already leading her by the nose! But 
<story>it looks like they're enjoying themselves.

data.text:
I can't wait to see how the team that I created evolves. 
I'm looking forward to seeing what you two can achieve!
data.name: Chief Trainer
data.processed:
<story>I can't wait to see how the team that I created evolves. 
<story>I'm looking forward to seeing what you two can achieve!

data.text: Thank you!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Thank you!

data.text:
The sky above Nakayama Racecourse began to turn a reddish hue as 
our voices echoed through the air.
data.processed:
<story>The sky above Nakayama Racecourse began to turn a reddish hue as 
<story>our voices echoed through the air.

data.text:
The sky above Nakayama Racecourse began to turn a reddish hue as 
our voices echoed through the air.
data.processed:
<story>The sky above Nakayama Racecourse began to turn a reddish hue as 
<story>our voices echoed through the air.
